title: At the Doctor's Office
description: Listen to a conversation between a patient and a doctor.

audio.text: Doctor: Good morning. What seems to be the problem today? [PAUSE] Patient: I've been feeling terrible for the past three days. I have a bad headache and a sore throat. [PAUSE] Doctor: I see. Do you have a fever? [PAUSE] Patient: Yes, I think so. I've been feeling hot and cold. [PAUSE] Doctor: Let me check your temperature. It's 38.5 degrees. You have a slight fever. Any other symptoms? [PAUSE] Patient: I've also been coughing a lot, especially at night. [PAUSE] Doctor: Have you taken any medicine? [PAUSE] Patient: Just some painkillers for the headache. [PAUSE] Doctor: Okay. It sounds like you have the flu. You should rest for a few days. I'll give you a prescription for medicine. Take it three times a day after meals. [PAUSE] Patient: How long will I feel like this? [PAUSE] Doctor: You should feel better in about a week. Drink lots of water and get plenty of rest. Come back if you don't feel better in 5 days.
